common_issues.title: PiecesOS launch failure due to potential OneDrive conflict
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing "PiecesOS was unable to launch" errors, potentially caused by OneDrive interference. Troubleshooting steps include checking OneDrive for logs and deleting the PiecesOS folder within OneDrive. Further investigation and support might be needed.

related_issues.title: PiecesOS was unable to launch
related_issues.text:
PiecesOS was unable to launch
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.2.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Ensure core Dependencies ... (retry setup)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8b426c73-aebb-4905-857f-bdee4cad2882)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation regarding PiecesOS launch

**Key Points Raised:**

* MR-AAYU experiencing "PiecesOS was unable to launch" error.
* Related issues suggested by bot: PiecesOS not launching, core dependencies error.
* MR-AAYU provided log files upon request.

**Problems Identified:**

* Multiple installations of Pieces for Developers (Microsoft Store & EXE).
* No logs found in specified PiecesOS location.
* OneDrive potentially interfering with launch.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Check for logs in OneDrive folder (C:\Users\AYUSH-ANAND\OneDrive\Documents\com.pieces.os).
* Delete OneDrive folder and relaunch PiecesOS.
* Schedule call with support for further troubleshooting.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* Issue not yet resolved.
* Further information & troubleshooting required.


**Additional Notes:**

* MR-AAYU provided machine specs for investigation.
* Support engineer suspects OneDrive interference as the cause.

recommendations: Investigate and address the OneDrive conflict issue causing PiecesOS launch failures.
Develop clearer guidance or troubleshooting steps for users experiencing OneDrive-related issues with PiecesOS.
Consider if multiple Pieces for Developers installations (Microsoft Store & EXE) are intended and if not, provide clearer installation instructions.
Review and improve error messaging related to core dependencies during PiecesOS setup.
Monitor the effectiveness of the proposed solutions for the "PiecesOS was unable to launch" error and iterate if needed.
